title: Can you make LCS Summoner icons cost IP?
body:
Dear Rito,
Can you pleeaaaaaaaaase make the summoner icons cost ip. I have 140k ip just sitting there and nothing to spend it on. So I was just wondering if you could make them cost IP instead of RP

replies.body:
I'd like this, but the idea of these icons is that 20% of the proceeds go to the team, whereas the other 80% of the proceeds go to other LCS stuff. IP, a completely virtual currency created by Riot just for LoL, isn't gonna fund that.
HOWEVER, I think it would be pretty cool if at the end of the season we would be able to get them for IP.
